Analytic Project Setup and Development 0.2.0
  • Reference

usethis2

usethis2

Overview

Automate analytic project setup tasks that are otherwise performed manually. This includes setting up docker, spinning up a microservice, and more.

Installation

You can install usethis2 by using:

install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("tidylab/usethis2")
